Text:
So, in the distant past, Diablos brought the world to
the brink of destruction.

But then three heroes arose from the humans, elves,
and therianthropes, took down the demon, and kept
the world safe.
But in its dying breath, Diablos cursed the heroes.

This curse was "possession"—in other words, the
afflication that was consuming your body—

(...That's the truth of the world as told by Master
Shadow to Lady Alpha. It indicates that the Church's
version is at least partially correct.)

(The Three Heroes actually existed, as did the demon
Diablos, and the heroes saved an endangered world.)

(But the Cult of Diablos has distorted history. The
truths of the past that were meant to be passed on
have been consigned to oblivion.)

...But, despite it all, there is one truth that was
not scrubbed away—

The truth of history as the Church tells it is that
Diablos was sealed, not slain!

...Our ancestors, the Three Heroes... Who were they,
really?

Knowing that truth may also lead to a deeper
understanding of why it is we fight the Cult!

(Maybe Lady Alpha was trying to lead me to this
realization?)

(I mean, I only picked up on the relationship between
that elf swordswoman and Olivier because Lady Alpha
was originally from a place near to the descendants
of the heroes...)

(...There's no denying that she's always been
special...)
...Heehee.

(The old me might've gotten all sulky on her own,
comparing herself to Lady Alpha or someone else.)
But now, I'm Beta—
And Natsume Kafka!
What the?! Are you THE Natsume Kafka?!
Eep!

Uh, um, ah, s-sorry to bother you like this! B-But I
am such a huge fan!
O-Oh, really... Why thank you.

I-If you don't mind, can I get your autograph—Ah! Oh
no! Of all the times not to have one of your books
with me, why now!

Well, if it's fine with you, I could sign a
handkerchief, too. I always keep a pen
on me!

Really?! Thank you so much! Okay, here, sign this,
please! I haven't used it today, so don't worry!
Not at all. Alright, this will take just a moment.

...By the way, what was the first book of mine that
you liked?
Oh! Um, "Spider Maneater"!

I just love the part where the heroes get in those
mechanical giants and go to save themselves in
another world!

...Wow, it's really amazing how you're able to write
without looking at the where you're writing!

Heehee, well, it wouldn't do for me to get so caught
up in signing my name that I don't look my reader in
the face, now would it?
Omigosh...! You couldn't be any more incredible!

Oh, I'm nothing of the sort. Just please keep on
reading, okay?

Thank you! I'm going to frame this handkerchief and
make it into a family heirloom!

Whew, that kinda took me by surprise...! Maybe I
should have Delta teach me hide-and-seek too.

...Alright! Time for me to do what I can from my
unique perspective!
...Th-Therefore!
Therefore?!

After an exhaustive investigation, I've confirmed
that...

...there are no clues whatsoever to be found in
mainstream society regarding the Three Heroes
and the elven swordswoman!

I checked not only all the accessible documents in
Orum and Lindwurm, but also as many of the legends
committed to writing in other lands as possible!
In the end, I wasn't able to learn anything useful!
And yet you seem so confident...

Wait, are you on some sort of high that's kept you
awake?!

I am! I've been pulling an Eta this week and haven't
slept a wink!

Whoa, that's, uh...not so great, don't you think?
Part of this whole reorganization was to try and
normalize our working conditions...

So, if there're no leads to be found in mainstream
society, that means...I want you to focus on scouring
the underworld!

I see now. You eliminated all other feasible options
beforehand.

Well, if you've done all that, guess I just have to
get serious on my end as well.

...But it's not like I was entirely in the dark on
all this to begin with—
What was that, Zeta? Did you say something?
...Um, no? Maybe you're starting to nod off.

*yawn*... Maybe I am. Your voice is beginning to
sound like a lullaby...

Anyway, I'll take over from here. You go and get some
sleep.
I believe I will... Thanks, and good night!
...Heroes, huh.
Suppose this means I'll have to face things head-on—
